channel.title: Kratos 530 - Oldschool Content in HD!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://kratosrsps.org/assets/images/logo.png[/img][/center] [center]Nothing but high quality content. (in the early stages) http://kratosrsps.org/[/center]
[center] Kratos has been in development for around four years, originally starting off as the well-known Arios. We excelled at being named the greatest remake server RSPS has ever witnessed. Eventually, Arios took a turn for the worst and we thought the only way to bring back the greatness was with a new name, a few months of tender loving care, and time to get ourselves back together.
Kratos 530 offers the full HD experiences along with a mixture of unique custom OSRS/original updates. Below are some of the images that we've gathered within the past few months. Stay tuned for more updates/information.
Developers: [img]http://i.imgur.com/Okn8fok.png[/img]Hope (web) [img]http://i.imgur.com/iLeXGG5.png[/img]Emperor (server) [img]http://i.imgur.com/iLeXGG5.png[/img]Splinter (server) [img]http://i.imgur.com/iLeXGG5.png[/img]David (server) [/center]
[center][b]Quick Info:[/b][/center] [center][spoiler]* All players will be starting from scratch.
* The current XP rate is 20x. (Rate can be increased by voting and buying double XP with the free vote credits) (You may activate this buyable double XP whenever you want (has a cooldown))
* Since everyone is starting from scratch, there will most likely be gigantic amounts of competition between players.
* The game has an actual economy. Items like whips and amulets of fury are valuable and not just common junk you'd see like on other servers. (Item prices are also expected to be realistic -- this means that whips are expected to be 1.5 - 3m, not 100m like on other servers)[/spoiler][/center]
[center][b]Spolier[/b] For Content:[spoiler] - Music system - Achievement diaries - Boss pets - 20+ working quests - High-quality bosses including the Corporeal Beast - Random events - Oldschool RS (OSRS) content in HD - Distractions and Diversions - Many traveling methods like gnome gliders and canoes - High-quality skilling - Gravestone system - Ironman and Ultimate Ironman game modes - Minigames like Puro Puro and the Warrior's Guild [/spoiler][/center]
[center][b]Spoiler[/b] For Media:[spoiler] [img]http://imgur.com/rSrv1Sb.png[/img] Distraction and Diversions system
[img]http://i.imgur.com/de9Imtt.png[/img] High-quality cutscenes and development
[img]http://i.imgur.com/790FJHH.png[/img] Complete fully-working elite clue scrolls for a chance to win valuable rewards like the 3rd age longsword and lava dragon mask.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CyQ1H4S.png[/img] Kratos will have many Oldschool skilling methods available
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UHW0aUN.png[/img] Achievement diaries
[img]http://puu.sh/iNv0n/29f7ec5daa.png[/img] Emulated anti-macro events
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CiKTMhJ.png[/img] Battle emulated Oldschool RS bosses in HD
[img]http://puu.sh/jb8WS/20c795b69b.png[/img] Obtain new Oldschool RS items
[img]http://puu.sh/jgvu6/38614348d0.png[/img] Classic high-quality minigames
[img]http://puu.sh/jHkbI/30499a3a23.png[/img] Rogues chests in the wilderness are one such example of our new OS content
[img]http://puu.sh/iNuRs/c6dc96af28.png[/img] We offer more ways to travel: Consider using the charter service, gnome gliders, or even fairy rings
[img]http://puu.sh/iNuJN/55fb2553c4.png[/img] Quality end-game content for high level players
[img]http://puu.sh/ikJIJ/cd4eab9c35.png[/img] Play a server with a highly rewarding economy: When the server is released, the first players to 85 Slayer will most likely become rich!
[img]http://puu.sh/gHnHr/72e057cc4a.png[/img] The server will publicly announce when you've gotten a valuable drop, rubbing it in the faces of your fellow players
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qBkOhO9.png[/img] The Stronghold of Security and Stronghold of Player Safety are both fully ready for you to explore.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/K7TlFXQ.png[/img] Gain large amounts of experience in our emulated Ape Atoll Dungeon
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FbeJp5m.png[/img] Coordinate clue scrolls have guardians that appear when you dig in the proper spot
[img]http://i.imgur.com/odph89v.png[/img] The reward items look quite nice in HD
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bs8NpJc.png[/img] Possible Loot From An Elite Clue!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/RXTYRal.png[/img] More Possible Loot From An Elite Clue!
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/db341729c4509466bac50fcb120ef93e.gif[/img] Fantastic Unique Highscores for Kratos!
[img]http://imgur.com/0CktPnj.png[/img] More Oldschool bosses are going to be implemented shortly (with the first one being Vet'ion):
- Once the dogs appear, you won't be able to damage the boss until they are defeated (the pic below is taken at the exact time the dogs appeared) - Proper drop table - Uses AOE magic attack - Changes form - Weak to crush - Possibility of dropping a boss pet - Ring of the Gods is now obtainable, along with the Dragon pickaxe [/spoiler]

item.title: Kratos 530 - Oldschool Content in HD!
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

This just ruins the purpose of OS. It is meant to be 317 graphics. Not this pre-EoC thing. I understand younger players who never played RuneScape back in the day are not used to the simplicity of the SD graphics, but don’t bring that junk into OS.

Simply because of the graphics alone I definitely would not support this.

Read full topic

item.title: Kratos 530 - Oldschool Content in HD!
item.dc:creator: @omg_a_waffle omg a waffle
item.description:
@omg_a_waffle wrote:

Awesome graphics and great content! Looking forward to its release!!

Read full topic

item.title: Kratos 530 - Oldschool Content in HD!
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]Nothing but high quality content.
(in the early stages) http://kratosrsps.org/[/center]

[center]
Kratos has been in development for around four years, originally starting off as the well-known Arios.
We excelled at being named the greatest remake server RSPS has ever witnessed.
Eventually, Arios took a turn for the worst and we thought the only way to bring back the greatness was with a new name,
a few months of tender loving care, and time to get ourselves back together.

Kratos 530 offers the full HD experiences along with a mixture of unique custom OSRS/original updates.
Below are some of the images that we’ve gathered within the past few months. Stay tuned for more updates/information.

Developers:
Hope (web)
Emperor (server)
Splinter (server)
David (server)
[/center]

[center]Quick Info:[/center]
[center][spoiler]* All players will be starting from scratch.

  • The current XP rate is 20x.
    (Rate can be increased by voting and buying double XP with the free vote credits)
    (You may activate this buyable double XP whenever you want (has a cooldown))

  • Since everyone is starting from scratch, there will most likely be gigantic amounts of competition between players.

  • The game has an actual economy. Items like whips and amulets of fury are valuable and not just common junk you’d see like on
    other servers.
    (Item prices are also expected to be realistic – this means that whips are expected to be 1.5 - 3m, not 100m like on other servers)[/spoiler][/center]

[center]Spolier For Content:[spoiler]

  • Music system
  • Achievement diaries
  • Boss pets
  • 20+ working quests
  • High-quality bosses including the Corporeal Beast
  • Random events
  • Oldschool RS (OSRS) content in HD
  • Distractions and Diversions
  • Many traveling methods like gnome gliders and canoes
  • High-quality skilling
  • Gravestone system
  • Ironman and Ultimate Ironman game modes
  • Minigames like Puro Puro and the Warrior’s Guild
    [/spoiler][/center]

[center]Spoiler For Media:[spoiler]

rSrv1Sb.png762×500

Distraction and Diversions system

de9Imtt.png761×502

High-quality cutscenes and development


Complete fully-working elite clue scrolls for a chance to win valuable rewards
like the 3rd age longsword and lava dragon mask.

CyQ1H4S.png761×503

Kratos will have many Oldschool skilling methods available

UHW0aUN.png759×498

Achievement diaries


Emulated anti-macro events

CiKTMhJ.png760×501

Battle emulated Oldschool RS bosses in HD


Obtain new Oldschool RS items


Classic high-quality minigames

30499a3a23.png742×460

Rogues chests in the wilderness are one such example of our new OS content


We offer more ways to travel:
Consider using the charter service, gnome gliders, or even fairy rings


Quality end-game content for high level players


Play a server with a highly rewarding economy:
When the server is released, the first players to 85 Slayer will most likely become rich!


The server will publicly announce when you’ve gotten a valuable drop, rubbing it in the faces
of your fellow players

qBkOhO9.png767×504

The Stronghold of Security and Stronghold of Player Safety are both fully ready for you
to explore.

K7TlFXQ.png763×502

Gain large amounts of experience in our emulated Ape Atoll Dungeon

FbeJp5m.png764×502

Coordinate clue scrolls have guardians that appear when you dig in the proper spot

odph89v.png761×501

The reward items look quite nice in HD


Possible Loot From An Elite Clue!


More Possible Loot From An Elite Clue!

db341729c4509466bac50fcb120ef93e.gif1064×638

Fantastic Unique Highscores for Kratos!

0CktPnj.png763×503

More Oldschool bosses are going to be implemented shortly (with the first one being Vet’ion):

  • Once the dogs appear, you won’t be able to damage the boss until they are defeated
    (the pic below is taken at the exact time the dogs appeared)
  • Proper drop table
  • Uses AOE magic attack
  • Changes form
  • Weak to crush
  • Possibility of dropping a boss pet
  • Ring of the Gods is now obtainable, along with the Dragon pickaxe
    [/spoiler]

Read full topic
